description:
Full-time MBA opportunities in Business development & strategy
Applications to this opportunity are considered for all available Business development & strategy roles.
Business development manager
Business development managers identify key strategic initiatives to develop and successfully execute Go to Market strategies against top competitors. As part of this role you will drive capacity planning to ensure partner readiness to increase sales and market share. We are looking for a great individual, who can think out of the box with ideas, execute on messaging, design presentations to support to customer and partner communications and support the Enterprise Partner Team.
Qualifications
MBA degree (within six months of graduation from full-time studies).
Experience in selling software solutions to large enterprises preferred.
Skills required include:
Excellent communication skills and strong writing and presentation skills.
Strong desire and business acumen for consultative solution selling.
Exceptional negotiation, customer service, and interpersonal skills.
Passion for technology, both consumer and enterprise.
Some understanding of cloud computing, Microsoft Office 365, or devices preferred.
Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, religion, national origin, marital status, age, disability, veteran status, genetic information, or any other protected status.
